wikipedia_page.main:
Alec Richard Valentine (5 February 1928 – 11 May 1997(1997-05-11) (aged 69)) was a Scottish former international rugby union footballer. He was born in Hawick.
He was capped three times for Scotland in 1953, playing Flanker. He also played for RNAS Anthorn, and the Royal Navy, captaining the side.
His older brother Dave was also capped for Scotland, and his youngest brother Rob Valentine was capped for South of Scotland both brothers were subsequently capped at rugby league for Great Britain.

response: His younger brother Alec Valentine also played for ,Bath, p138 and his younger brother Rob played rugby union for South of Scotland, and later switched to rugby league playing for Great Britain.
Rob Valentine is the younger brother of the rugby union, and rugby league footballer; Dave Valentine, and the rugby union footballer; Alec Valentine.
